title: "The ICMM-CSIC leads an international project to manufacture neural networks for sustainable artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "CSIC, is leading an international project that will create artificial neural networks that will be used in integrated photonic circuits. They will do so with less energy consumption, an essential advance to promote the development of artificial intelligence."
